divs: Sighting DetailsWe were driving home from rained out races in knoxville going north on hwy 14 wen we saw red lights all same size and distance apart kind of in an arch pattern almost like floating up from a corn field almost like if u shot a roman candle but much bigger.they were in almost vertical line one after other just little redish solid lights they went up and I was seeing them out the windshield stopped to look out back window of truck and they were gone.never seen anything like it man made..if anyone else saw it plz respond.it was by the prison south of newton.
